title: Icon Buffet Icon Exchange.
content:
Are any of you aware of the Icon Buffet free Icon exchange? I just joined and received 2 free sets, which I can exchange with other members for other sets.

[Icon Exchange](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201112909/http:/www.iconbuffet.com/categories/icons)

 [‹ Teachers take note](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201112909/http:/www.typophile.com/node/20825 "Go to previous forum topic") [Futura medieval ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201112909/http:/www.typophile.com/node/20826 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Asvetic

comments.content: Sorry wrong page [Icon Delivery](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201112909/http:/www.iconbuffet.com/delivery)

Hey Andrew, I’ll exchange with you.

I’m looking for any of the following sets:

(Sets marked with ’ \*\*\* ’ are ones that I’d like to stock up on first.

Dresden Tournament  
Helsinki Hi-Fi  
Mallow Buzz 1  
Mallow Buzz 2  
Manhattan Finance \*\*\*  
Manhattan Night Life \*\*\*  
Modena Alfanumerico Cold  
Modena Simbolo \*\*\*  
Shanghai Tech \*\*\*  
Shanghai Tech Smilies  
Taipei Buddies 1  
Taipei Buddies 2  
Tower Grove Melee  
Tower Grove Promenade  
Tower Grove Wedding

And I have these sets to trade:

Blinksale  
Durango Research  
Farewell Snow  
Manhattan Metroplex  
Marseilles Cafe  
Oslo Atmosphere  
Oslo Easter  
Oslo Finance  
Shanghai Tech Vector  
Taipei Monkey  
Taipei Night Market  
Taipei Plastic Primates  
Tower Grove Melee  
Tower Grove Wedding

You can contact me here: splorp\_at\_mac\_dot\_com

Grant - sent you Durango Research, Marseilles Café, and Tower Groves. No email listed on your profile, btw. Check your splorp.com addy.

Would love your Blinksale and Oslo Atmosphere and Easter.

What you got, Andrew?

Stephen - Thanks a heap. Your icon requests are on their way.

Dagnabbit, I thought email addresses were part of the Typophile profile pages... the previous post has been adjusted accordingly.

Well, I have Manhattan Finance and Oslo Atmosphere.

Grant- sent you Manhattan Finance to your Splorp account also. I wish I had more of a selection to share.

Stephen - sent you Oslo Atmosphere to your stewf account, which was difficult to find. Again, wish I had a larger selection to share.

My addy is Asvetic at Yahoo.
Does anyone have an example of something they’ve done with these?

Grant and Stephen - I resent thru Iconbuffet, sorry my noviceness has shown quite brightly.

Stephen - thanks for your contributions
Andrew, thanks for the contribution. I sent you a fine selection of chewy pixel goodness via IconBuffet. Enjoy.

I have:

Durango Research  
Farewell Snow  
Oslo Atmosphere and Finance  
Shanghai Tech  
Taipei Night Market  
Tower Grove Melee

and would like to get Blinksale, Manhattan Finance & Nightlife, Marseilles Cafe, Tower Grove Promenade & Wedding.

Hope they put some of their CMS icons up too.

—-

jlt : [http://www.hewnandhammered.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201112909/http:/www.hewnandhammered.com/ "http://www.hewnandhammered.com") : rnrmf!

I cannot seem to get an account. Does the website dislike Safari?

I feel like I am missing out on something fun. This sux. :’^(
Works with my Safari. You got your cookies on? Try deleting your cookies for iconbuffet.com
Didn’t think about deleting the cookies. Thanks, Stewf. :^)

Hey Guys!! Here’s what I have and what I’d like to get!

I have:  
Blinksale  
Manhattan Metroplex  
Modena Alfanumeric Molten  
Oslo Easter  
Oslo Finance  
Shanghei Tech  
Taipei Night Market  
Taipei Plastic Primates

Dresden Tournament

Helsinki Hi-Fi  
Mallow Buzz 1  
Mallow Buzz 2  
Manhattan Finance

Marseilles Cafe  
Modena Alfanumerico Cold

If you need any of the ones I have just let me know, and if you can help with any of the ones I want, that’s GREAT!! Thanks!!

( [shark\_byte05@yahoo.com](mailto:shark_byte05@yahoo.com))

-Heather-

I’ve got:  
Marseilles Cafe  
Oslo Finance  
Taipei Night Market

I’d like anything you can send me :) but especially:  
Blinksale, Manhattan Metroplex, and Tower Grove Melee.

veratil(at)fastmail.fm

I have Oslo Finance (only, just joined), and am looking for most anything, especially Tower Grove Promenade or Wedding or perhaps Marsailles Cafe...

mikemcd141 (at) gmail (dot) com

Thanks

mikemcd141,

I sent you Marsailles cafe, it was the only one on your list I have.

Could I trouble you for your Oslo Finance?

joraff [.at.] gmail [.dot.] com

Thanks joraff, I’ve just sent you Oslo Finance

Mike

Mike, I can send you tower\_grove\_promenade. Can you send me Oslo Finance please? Thanks!  
Peter: I can send you tower\_grove\_promenade in exchange for Marseille Café. Game?

Andi

Thanks Andi, I’ll send your icons right away.

Mike
You rock Mike - thanks!
